Name: Bus Parking 3D
About the game: The Legend is now on Steam. More than 10 million downloads in Android platform and rated above 4.0 If you like Bus Games, you should definitely try this game. In this legendary Bus Game, you will drive and park different buses. - Park a Coach Bus, City Bus and School Bus - Realistic controls and challenging levels. - Different gameplay modes: Classic and Relax Features of Bus Parking 3D: - Side Mirrors - Realistic Bus sound effects - Realistic Bus physics - Easy controls - HD Graphics - Family friendly Controls: W/Up Arrow: Accelerate S/Down Arrow: Brake/Drive backwards A/Left Arrow: Steer Left D/Right Arrow: Steer Right X: Handbrake Also drag mouse on visual Steering Wheel: Steering While first(default) camera is active, drag mouse on the center of the screen to rotate camera and change view.
